title: Current status of research on composite bipolar plates for proton exchange membrane fuel cells (PEMFCs): nanofillers and structure optimization
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,7172-7194
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08054D, Review Article

Li Wenkai, Xie Zhiyong, Zeng Haodong
Research progress and analysis of composite bipolar plates for proton exchange membrane fuel cells – nanofillers: carbon black, carbon nanotubes, graphene. Structural optimization: distribution, conductive path and interface modification.
